Comments_List: I learned the history of black dance forms and made connections between dancers. I learned how to effectively analyze dance videos, and the class improved my writing.
Since the classes were long, I sometimes felt bored in class. My favorite parts of the class were when we got up and learned the dances. I also learned a lot during the writing workshops.
I would recommend this course to another student if they were interested in dance. Since I was interested in the subject, it made writing the papers much easier.
Definitely take it, it is super chill, and the professor is really nice. He also gives good feedback to improve your essays.
